Posts.Content: I had  a lumpectomy w/ radiation 6years  ago .As fae as the  way the  rad is delivered,Im not  sure  just what you mean Each treatment (I had 35) took about  90 seconds and  the  rad (heat)   poured  through  a  machine  onto the area  where  the  tumor  was  removed  - Totallly  painless I was  warned  that I  would get  tired  -and  also that  my breast  might  get  burned  form the  rad None  of the  2  occured. I acutally had  alot  of  energy and  never  burned - I did  apply  some  special  ointment  on  the breast after each  rad  treatment .  I dont remember the  name  of it  but  if  you have  any interest  I will be happy  to  try to  find  out  . I am now  6 years  cancer  free ! GD Luck!
Posts.Title: Radiation and side effects

Posts.Content: I did not wear a bra  after I had  my  lumpectomy'wanted  the  area  to heal naturally w/o any  material  rubbing  or touching  it-Im small  chested  so  makes it  easier I had  my lumptecomy  on a  monday afternoon  (slepy home  that night ) and  was the  grocery store  the  next  morning (Living in  the city I walk  there ) I would say it took me  only  3 days   to feel  totally back to normal. I did not need  the pain meds  that I was  sent home with I did  not need  the ice packs ( for swelling ) I know that OI was  very  luck   to have had  such an  easy  time  with the  lumperctomy,   and  the  radiation that followed I am now  6 years  cancer free gd  luck  to  you
